summary: A group of rebellious youth find themselves in hot water when a girl is killed while they are partying
cast: Ángel Aranda|María Mahor|Luis Prendes|Manuel Gil|José Marco Davó|José Thelman|Marisol Ayuso|Francisco Cornet|Silvana Velasco|Ángel Menéndez|José Riesgo|Juan García Tiendra|Luis Marín|Gonzalo Linares|Marcela Sola|Mario Moreno|Viky Lussón|Gregorio Díaz|Olga Caballero|Mari Carmen Díaz de Mendoza|Manuel Alba|Mercedes Alonso|Mara Laso|Vicente Ros
title: Todos eran culpables
